column2: 7-12 Male  on Treatment for less than 1 month (Caregiver)
column9: My 11 yo son had an ear infection and fluid in his ear.  He has a high threshold of pain.  When I took him to the doc he was mad because he thought I had waited to long to bring him in it was so bad.  But, he had just started complaining the night before and he was in a lot of pain (quick).  Very unlike him to be in pain.  He also has a lot of earwax.  I gave him the drops and within an hour he stopped complaining and crying.
